div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 336 Delos, 1964 Burial: c. 88 B.C. Contents: 5 AV, 59 AR. From excavations; found with jewelry Athens: 59 New Style tetradr. Rhodes: 3 st.; 2 hemist. Disposition: Myconos Hackens-Levy, BCH 1965, pp. 503-34 (coins), 535-66 (jewelry), illus.
